text_block_list.text: On a day off——

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
So it's you. 
What are you doing in a place like this?

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
An exhibit for accessories. 
——However, there was nothing of note.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
……In my name, I command. 
Guide me to a place where I can relieve this boredom.
choice_data_list: Somewhere you won't get bored, huh?

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
Correct. Spare no effort. 
Remember that your fate——will be determined by my humor.

That would be quite the challenge. I wonder where I 
should take her……? While thinking about various 
options, we wandered around the department store.

Somehow, we ended up at my usual shopping venue. 
Orfevre declared she wanted to see some clothing.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
Ohh……How unexpected, it's quite fitting. 
You will accompany me while wearing this.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
Rejoice. It is the King's preferred color. If you were to 
wear it, then you too might gain some strength. Further——

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: When I see you like this……it raises my spirit.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: And mysteriously……it makes my right hand tremble.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
It must be an honor to be so encouraged by myself. 
In this moment——I'll allow you to weep in joy.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: Experiential Entertainment……is that what this is?
choice_data_list: Umalator tech seems to be involved.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
Very well, my interest is piqued. The King shall 
personally be the judge. You will accompany me.

text_block_list.name: NPC King
text_block_list.text:
『Oh Hero! I'm grateful you have arrived! This country is 
under threat by monsters. Please save us with your power!』

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: ……A foolish King.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: To think that he is unable to sufficiently protect his own domain——

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
A King——is someone who rules over all. 
At the same time, he must be strong enough to overcome any usurper.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: I refuse to serve a fool who can only tremble on this throne.

And so, 
our adventure began, but……

text_block_list.name: Ferocious Monster
text_block_list.text: 『Grrrrrrrrr……!』

Our first objective was to earn money to purchase 
stronger equipment but……she ignored that and moved 
on, saying 『Who are you to tell me how to proceed?』
choice_data_list: M-maybe we should head back and prepare——

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: Fuu!

text_block_list.name: Ferocious Monster
text_block_list.text: 『Gyaaaaaaa……!』

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
How weak. 
Is there no one that can rival me?

Wasn't the technology in the Umalator supposed to reflect 
the Player's physical parameters only to a certain extent?

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
What's wrong? 
You may disarm the traps.

The door would open with a certain gimmick…… 
I had to find it quickly. When I looked around, 
a suspicious stone statue caught my eye.
choice_data_list: This statue……maybe this can be pushed in?

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
I'll allow it. 
Try it.

A single kick from Orfevre was enough to resolve everything 
up to this point. But, now I don't have any proper equipment. 
I still had to make myself useful though——

text_block_list.name: Stone Statue Monster
text_block_list.text: 『Roooaaaaaaaar!』

As the stone statue activated, I leapt back in a panic. 
It seemed to be aiming for me.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
How amusing. 
As a vassal, you should show your worth.

Orfevre watched on in amusement as I ended 
up desperately fleeing from the monster.

text_block_list.name: Demon Dragon
text_block_list.text: 『Gr……aaaaaa………!』

A giant monster fell to the ground after being 
kicked by Orfevre. Its strength was so underwhelming 
in comparison I couldn't help but be shocked.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
All shall prostrate before me. 
——Hm?

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: Good. Open it.

I had a bad feeling about this, but since it was 
the reward from a Demon Dragon it could be some 
powerful equipment. I bravely opened the chest——

text_block_list.name: Mimic
text_block_list.text: 『Gwaaaaaaaaaah!』
choice_data_list: I knew this was gonna happen!

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: Fuu, it swallowing you whole was astonishing.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
However……to try to take my clown from right before my eyes. 
……You will return them.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: Oooooooooh!

I felt a sudden impact followed by a feeling of weightlessness. 
Orfevre's kick had destroyed the monster in one hit, but——

After being kicked with that kind of force, 
both the monster and I ended up flying through the air……

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
How pleasant. 
I'll offer you praise.
Somehow it seemed like she had fun, so I was safe for now……

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
However……it seems you really do have talent as a clown. 
You may continue to cultivate that talent.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
It was quite fulfilling to partake. 
You've done well.

I hurriedly chased after 
Orfevre as she carried on……
